page.title: 15Buildings around us
page.content: In Tenbury there are many buildings mostly made up of houses and shops. We did a survey of Berrington road and found that there are 26 Detatched houses, 21 Bungalows, 15 Semi Detatched, 9 rows of 4 terraced houses, a Police station, a farm shop, A Catholic church, and two building sites. So there are mostly Detatched houses in Berrington Road. Our next survey was what type of house children in our School live in. There are 85 people who live in Semi Detatched, 67 live in Detatched, 20 who live in cottages,14 who live in bungalows, 11 people who live in Terrace houses and only 5 people who live in Flats.So this time Semi Detatched is most popular. Cornwall House is at the top of Cross Street and is a large house. It has small glass windows called Sash
